name: suksma - age of the child

b1ed=0.000

wavecode_2_samples=512
wavecode_2_sep=0

wavecode_2_bUseDots=0

wavecode_3_bUseDots=0

wavecode_3_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_3_r=1.000
wavecode_3_g=1.000
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=4
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0
shapecode_0_textured=0
shapecode_0_num_inst=1
shapecode_0_x=0.500
shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.10000
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_0_r=1.000
shapecode_0_g=0.000
shapecode_0_b=0.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000
shapecode_0_r2=0.000
shapecode_0_g2=0.000
shapecode_0_b2=0.000
shapecode_0_a2=0.000
shapecode_0_border_r=0.400
shapecode_0_border_g=0.500
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*cos(time*1.8), .5*sin(time*1.8));
shape_0_per_frame2=g = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*cos(time*2.3), .5*sin(time*2.3));
shape_0_per_frame3=b = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*cos(time*3.2), .5*sin(time*3.2));
shape_0_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.2;
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame12=x = x - .1*tan(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame13=y = y - .1*sin(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_0_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_0_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_0_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_0_per_frame18=
shape_0_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=2.41456
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.000
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=0.400
shapecode_1_border_g=0.500
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shape_1_per_frame1=r = .5*sin(time*2.234);
shape_1_per_frame2=g = .5*sin(time*2.345);
shape_1_per_frame3=b = .5*sin(time*2.456);
shape_1_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.1;
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame12=x = x - .2*sin(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame13=y = y - .2*tan(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_1_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_1_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_1_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=30
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=1
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.44484
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=0.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shape_2_per_frame1=r2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.523), 1);
shape_2_per_frame2=g2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.983), 1);
shape_2_per_frame3=b2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.75+.5*sin(time*1.194), 1);
shape_2_per_frame4=rad = rad - .4*bass_att;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=x = x +.5*sin(time);
shape_2_per_frame7=y = y -.2*cos(time);
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=t = time*12.3;
per_frame_2=rot = rot + 0.030*( 0.60*sin(0.38*time) + 0.40*sin(0.54*time) );
per_frame_3=dx = dx + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.434*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_4=dy = dy + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.384*time) + 0.40*sin(0.477*time) );
warp_1=`float3 color, mus;
warp_2=`float dx,dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5);
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float rota = lum(tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/4))*q31;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`uv6 = mul(uv1,float2x2(cos(rota),-sin(rota),sin(rota),cos(rota)));
warp_13=`uv6 += sin(q32*uv1);
warp_14=`mus = .2/(sqrt(uv6.x)+.2);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`mus *= float3 (1.1,1,.95);
warp_17=`mus *= .9+.1*tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float2 hor = float2 (0.005,0);
warp_22=`float2 ver = float2 (0,.005);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float dx = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+hor) 
warp_25=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-hor));
warp_26=`float dy = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+ver) 
warp_27=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-ver));
warp_28=`
warp_29=`
warp_30=`float2 zz = float2 (dx,dy);
warp_31=`
warp_32=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv+zz*.02);
warp_33=`float3 crisp2 = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_34=`crisp += crisp2/2;
warp_35=`crisp *= .67;
warp_36=`crisp +=.08 * mus - length(zz)*blur;
warp_37=`
warp_38=`float3 ret1 = crisp - lum(blur)*.04;
warp_39=`ret = ret1 * .99 -  .04 ;
warp_40=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_8=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_9=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_10=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_13=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_14=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_15=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_18=`
comp_19=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_20=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_21=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_22=`    ret += 1.15;
comp_23=`    ret *= lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)*treb_att),pow(hue_shader.xzy,bass_att));
comp_24=`    ret *= ret;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_27=`}
